name: Peach Sangria
ingredients: white wine, peach pure and brandy or peach schnapps, orange juice or triple sec, seltzer or sprite, peach, orange, apple, green grapes
instructions: cut fruits to small pieces, add ingredients to the pitcher with ice depending on the strength or sweetness of your liking, stir thoroughly

name: Strawberry Mojito
ingredients: lemon rum, triple sec, lemon or lime juice, mint, lime, strawberries, sprite or seltzer and sugar
instructions: crush mint, lime wedges, strawberries and sugar if using seltzer, add ice, 1 oz of lime juice, rum and top off with soda, stir the ingredients

name: Blackberry Prosecco Punch
ingredients: prosecco, rum, lemonade, blackberries, lemon
instructions: in a pitcher with ice combine all liquid ingredients in equal proportions, add a lot of blackberries and few pieces of lemon

name: Rosemary Gin Fizz
ingredients: gin, lemon juice, lime juice, rosemary sprigs, seltzer, sugar
instructions: combine 1/3 of gin, 1/3 of seltzer and 1/3 of mix of lemon and lime juice, add sugar and rosemary sprigs, stir thoroughly

name: Raspberry Lemonade
ingredients: vodka, lemonade, raspberry lemonade, raspberries, lemon
instructions: in a pitcher with ice add an equal parts of liquid ingredients, add raspberries and lemon slices

name: Grapefruit Bourbon
ingredients: bourbon, triple sec, grapefruit juice, grapefruit,basil
instructions: in a pitcher with ice add 1/3 of bourbon, 1/3 of grapefruit juice, 1/4 of triple sec, grapefruit slices and basil (optional for pop of color

name: Margarita
ingredients: tequila, triple sec, lime juice, seltzer, limes, salt in the saucer (optional)
instructions: in the pitcher with ice add 1/3 tequila, 1/4 triple sec, 1 oz of lime juice, top off with seltzer, add lime slices

name: Pomegranate Sangria
ingredients: red dry wine, brandy, pomegranate juice, orange juice, seltzer, orange, pear, pomegranate seeds,
instructions: pour ingredients in the pitcher over ice, add fruits ans stir

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: pineapple juice, coconut milk, seltzer, pineapple
instructions: blend ingredients with ice, garnish with pineapple

name: Peach Sangria
ingredients: peach pure, orange juice, pineapple juice, seltzer, peach, orange, apple, green grapes
instructions: add ingredients to the pitcher over ice depending on the sweetness of your liking, stir

name: Strawberry Mojito
ingredients: lemon or lime juice, mint, lime, strawberries, sprite or seltzer and sugar
instructions: crush mint, lime wedges, strawberries and sugar if using seltzer, add ice, 1 oz of lime or lemon juice, top off with soda and stir thoroughly

name: Pomegranate Sangria
ingredients: pomegranate juice, orange juice, seltzer, oranges, pomegranate seeds, pears
instructions: pour ingredients in the pitcher overs ice, add fruits and stir

name: Berry Iced Tea
ingredients: iced tea, strawberry and raspberry lemonade, berry mix (can be fresh or frozen), lemon
instructions: pour ingredients in the pitcher overs ice, add berries, lemon slices and stir

name: Youth Cocktail
ingredients: soda, cucumber, mint, lemon
instructions: pour soda in the pitcher over ice, add mint, slices of cucumbers, lemon and stir

name: Citrus Fiesta
ingredients: orange juice, grapefruit juice, seltzer, orange, tangerine
instructions: pour juices in the pitcher over ice, add seltzer, slices og orange and tangerine wedges

name: Tropical Paradise
ingredients: pineapple juice, mango juice, seltzer, mango, pineapple, strawberry
instructions: pour juices in the pitcher over ice, add seltzer, fruits and strawberries for a color

name: Sunset in Miami
ingredients: lemon rum, pineapple juice, grenadine
instructions: in the glass combine 1/3 of rum, add 1/3 of pineapple juice, transfer to the shaker with ice, strain back to the glass, add a splash of grenadine to the bottom

name: Cappuccino Martini
ingredients: chocolate vodka or vodka and godiva, kahlua, espresso, baileys
instructions: in a shaker with ice add a splash of each ingredient, shake well, garnish with shaved chocolate or espresso beans or both

name: Lychee Martini
ingredients: lychee juice, vodka, lychee
instructions: in the glass combine 1/3 of vodka and 1/3 of lychee juice, transfer to shaker with ice, stir back to the glass, add lychee

name: Raspberry Kiss
ingredients: vodka, chambord, raspberry lemonade
instructions: in the glass combine 1/4 of vodka, 1/4 of chambord and 1/4 of raspberry lemonade, transfer to shaker with ice, stir back to the glass, add raspberry

name: Strawberry Crush
ingredients: strawberry vodka, lemonade, strawberry, basil
instructions: crush 2 strawberries in a glass, add 3 basil leaves, 1/3 strawberry vodka and 1/3 lemonade, stir, and add ice.

name: Spicy Margarita
ingredients: tequila, triple sec, lime juice, lime, jalapeno
instructions: in the glass combine 1/3 of tequila, 1/4 of triple sec and splash of lime juice, transfer to shaker with ice, stir back to the glass, add jalapeno and lime wedge

name: Passion Daiquiry
ingredients: rum, triple sec, lime juice, passion fruit puree or juice
instructions: in the glass with ice combine 1/3 of rum, 1/4 of triple sec, 1/4 of passion fruit juice os tablespoon of puree, splash of lime juice and stir, or blend in blender

name: Love Potion
ingredients: gin, elderflower liquor, lime juice, rose champagne
instructions: in the glass with ice combine 1/4 of gin, 1/4 of elderflower liquor, splash of lime juice, stir, top off with rose champagne

name: Mimosa
ingredients: champagne, orange juice
instructions: pour champagne in 2/3 of the flute, add a splash of orange juice, garnish with orange and mint

name: Chambord Royale
ingredients: champagne, chambord
instructions: pour champagne in 2/3 of the flute, add a splash of chambord, garnish with raspberry and basil

name: Bellini
ingredients: champagne, peach juice
instructions: pour champagne in 2/3 of the flute, add a splash of peach juice, garnish with slice of peach

name: Irish Coffee
ingredients: irish whiskey, coffee, whipped cream
instructions: in a mug pour coffee, add a splash of whiskey, and top off with whipped cream

name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: vodka, tomato juice, salt, black pepper, worcestershire sauce, red pepper sauce, lemon juice
instructions: in the glass with ice combine 1/3 of vodka, 1/3 of tomato juice, add splash of lemon juice, dash of sauces, salt and pepper, garnish, with celery stick

name: St Germain Sprits
ingredients: champagne, elderflower liquor, soda
instructions: in a glass with ice combine 1/3 of each ingredients, stir, garnish with lemon twist

name: Aperole Spritz
ingredients: champagne, aperole, soda
instructions: in a glass with ice combine 1/3 of each ingredients, stir, garnish with orange twist

name: Irish Cream Affogato
ingredients: coffee, irish cream, ice cream
instructions: in a mug add coffee, splash of baileys and 1 small scoop of vanilla ice cream
